Instantly.AddIRCMessage: @#PLAYERNAME# Great job Cap, we got the second one
@channel I am detecting mobile data transmission on Fluffy's battlestation, worth checking out with an eOs scanner

OnConnect.AddIRCMessage: @channel What the fuck is this? This guy has EnSec?
So, Ms. EnTech representative, how can you explain this?
It only could be a hijacked early build. In that case, I can help a little
I can scan his network and make a copy node with the same network map
Here you go "1.1.1.1" . Simply gain admin access and scan the node, maybe you can find new entry point

OnAdminGained.AddIRCMessage: @channel We are through, there is only one file here that hasn't been deleted
FBI would be really intrested in this now
@#PLAYERNAME# Captain, get the evidence on our Asset server!
